overview: In a southern Mexico village, young deaf students are taking on an unusual challenge: to make a movie out of their dreams. While Eric and his friends watch films and discuss ideas, their dreams begin to work their way into the documentary itself. Both a study of the students lives and the basic visual language of film

production_companies.name: Fondo para la Producción Cinematográfica de Calidad

tagline: Do deaf people dream about music?
title: Eye Music
